lawmakers.name: Carl Kruger
lawmakers.subtitle: Senator, Brooklyn

lawmakers.name: Malcolm A. Smith
lawmakers.subtitle: Senator, Queens

lawmakers.name: Eric A. Stevenson
lawmakers.subtitle: Assemblyman, Bronx

lawmakers.name: Clarence Norman Jr.
lawmakers.subtitle: Assemblyman, Brooklyn
lawmakers.description: Convicted of accepting illegal campaign contributions and extorting money from judicial candidates.

lawmakers.name: Dean G. Skelos
lawmakers.subtitle: Senator, Long Island

lawmakers.name: Pedro Espada Jr.
lawmakers.subtitle: Senator, Bronx

lawmakers.name: Efraín González Jr.
lawmakers.subtitle: Senator, Bronx

lawmakers.name: Shirley L. Huntley
lawmakers.subtitle: Senator, Queens

lawmakers.name: Alan G. Hevesi
lawmakers.subtitle: State Comptroller
lawmakers.description: Pleaded guilty to using state workers to chauffeur his wife;  he also pleaded guilty for his role in a corruption scandal involving the state pension fund.

lawmakers.name: Hiram Monserrate
lawmakers.subtitle: Senator, Queens

lawmakers.name: Diane M. Gordon
lawmakers.subtitle: Assemblywoman, Brooklyn

lawmakers.name: Anthony S. Seminerio
lawmakers.subtitle: Assemblyman, Queens
lawmakers.description: Indicted  for  Honest services fraud.  In June 2009, he pleaded guilty to taking large sums of money from hospitals through a consulting firm while serving as a member of the New York State Assembly.

lawmakers.name: Sheldon Silver
lawmakers.subtitle: Assembly Speaker
lawmakers.description: Convicted of taking in nearly $4 million in exchange for using his position to help benefit a researcher and two real estate developers.

lawmakers.name: Dennis H. Gabryszak
lawmakers.subtitle: Assemblyman

lawmakers.name: Sam Hoyt
lawmakers.subtitle: Assemblyman
lawmakers.description: Banned from having interns in his office after having an affair with an intern.

lawmakers.name: Micah Z. Kellner
lawmakers.subtitle: Assemblyman, Manhattan
lawmakers.description: Sanctioned for sexually harassing members of his staff.

lawmakers.name: Vito J. Lopez
lawmakers.subtitle: Assemblyman, Brooklyn
lawmakers.description: Sanctioned by the Legislative Ethics Commission for sexually harassing members of his staff; he was stripped of  seniority and forbidden from employing interns under the age of 21.
